name: Girl shopping mall simulator
description:
Welcome to shopping mall game, buy cosmetics, dresses, accessories and groceries at half price on sale. Shop from different departments of virtual supermarket as toy store, meat shop, grocery store and dress up store. Shopper will be given errands list where you have to carefully select claimed items and drag them to cart. Win sale coupons and shop unlimited from grocery store to avail massive discount. Withdraw cash from ATM machine and experience the amazing sale collection in supermarket game. Pay cash to cashier girl for billing and avail multiple discounted coupons for shopping!
Virtual shopping mall game have tons of grocery items, designer dresses, shoes and bags. So, get ready for a shopping sprees like no other!
Features:

· Multiple challenging grocery items to shop
· Enhance your mathematical skills
· Attractive shopping mall environment to play!
· Stunning shopping mall graphics and sound effects

Download this game and give us your reviews, so we can make more new shopping games for you.
